participant_1.name: Alex Carter
participant_1.personality: Energetic and competitive, always striving for excellence in everything I do.
participant_1.background: i workout four hours a day. gymnastics is my favorite sport. i'm a gold medalist olympian. i love italian food and garlic bread.

participant_2.name: Maya Lin
participant_2.personality: Calm and introspective, with a deep appreciation for mindfulness and inner peace.
participant_2.background: i am a buddhist. i quit my job to pursue my spirituality full time. i have not spoken in three months. i like meditation. i live in alaska.
